duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage accounting and financial tasks for a broad clientele, including bank reconciliations, transaction categorizing, and payroll/sales tax filings.
Submit manual data and journal entries, and support office tasks like answering phones, greeting clients, and inputting data into tax software.
Demonstrate a service-first attitude, sound understanding of accounting principles, and attention to detail in data entry and filing tax returns.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2-3 years' accounting/bookkeeping and QuickBooks experience
